The user converts [[chakra]] into timber under the ground and lets it grow rapidly while forming it into a wooden prison. The size of the prison is based on the user's imagination. From an insect cage to a great prison, one can make it into whatever they want by regulating the amount of chakra used. The timber itself is treated with a chakra coating, making its destruction extremely difficult. During war, it has the great ability to detain prisoners, but it can also be used as a disciplinary measure for quarrelling subordinates.

== Trivia ==
* In ''[[Naruto the Movie: Blood Prison]]'', when Yamato used this technique to imprison [[Naruto]], parts of the prison extended into the interior to serve as additional shackles to bind Naruto, and [[Tsunade]] placed a [[sealing tag]] onto the prison, which, when removed, caused the prison to disappear similar to recalling a summon.
